title: VSO ConvertXtoDVD 3.7.0.186+keygen
description:
ConvertXtoDVD - 3.7.0
=====================

bugfixes
This version include an important update for audio decoder, now more HD audio format are supported ( such some audio stream available in MKV HD or Blu-ray )

- 0002863: [Bug] 3.6.13.180 : Bad framerate detection on a specific FLV Files (wesson) - resolved.
- 0002858: [Bug] When converting a 2 file cd (merged together) output size should be DVD5 instead it is creating a DVD9 output. (wesson) - resolved.
- 0002861: [Bug] No Audio on converted video when the source is DTS 5.0 (wesson) - resolved.
- 0002862: [Bug] iso output grayed out (wesson) - resolved.
- 0002567: [Bug] [X] Burn results to dvd / ISO Image in working folder setting not kept (wesson) - resolved.
